Job Description:
Full Stack Developer :
Nila Apps is looking for Full Stack developers in Chennai with experience in PHP platforms with AngularJS front end to join our team in Chennai. As a member of our team, you will support the development of various web and mobile apps using AWS cloud infrastructure. You will help develop features such as payment processing, campaign management, event management, messaging, etc. You must be passionate about bug free code and automated unit testing.
We are a fully automated DevOps shop with Automated Software Deployment and automated publishing of hundreds of mobile apps to the Apple and Google play store. If you are looking for a challenging opportunity working with technologies such as AWS Lambda, Code Star, Cloud formation, Container deployment, SES, EC3, Route53 etc, we would like to talk to you. As a fast growing company with several customers and new products, we provide an environment where the growth potential is huge and the ability to work on different new technologies is high.

Your responsibilities include, but not limited to:
Creating applications using PHP backend
Developing frontend code using AngularJS framework
Creating unit test and test automation scripts
Participate in code reviews and providing input for improving coding standards
Develop and maintain DevOps scripts for automated deployment
Analyzing and Troubleshooting of issues/bugs/enhancement requests and suggesting appropriate solutions
Provide input to product development team regarding new feature request based on customer interactions
Maintain software documentation using tools such as Confluence, Giffy, and Jira

Requirements
Desired Candidates :
Bachelor's degree in any major.
Experience of 2 to 6 years as a full stack developer using PHP platforms
Experience working with frontend technologies such as Angular JS.
Experience working with MySQL or SQL Server or Oracle database

Nice to have skills/experience includes:
Building microservices using Spring boot
Knowledgeable in, REST/SOAP Web Services
Experience working with payment gateways
Experience with AWS Lambda, API gateway, SES and other services
Developing server side REST API using PHP or Java
Experience with third party integration with GSP providers, SMS messaging providers
Automation tools such as fast lane, cloud formation, etc
Keywords: Angularjs, MySQL, php, Core PHP

Job Description:
As a data engineer, you will use modern data architecture approaches to help our customers meet key business objectives
In this role, you may review and architect data architecture or be part of a program from inception to design & build data pipelines
We are seeking an experienced and passionate PHP Developer with extensive knowledge of CodeIgniter, MySQL, and AWS services
The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing high-quality applications, managing backend services and the interchange of data between the server and the users
Key Responsibilities:

Develop High-Quality Applications: Develop and maintain high-performance, scalable, and custom-built PHP applications using CodeIgniter. Ensure the development of efficient, testable, and reusable PHP modules.

Database Management: Integrate and manage databases using MySQL. Optimize and maintain complex application SQL queries.

AWS Services Management: Deploy, maintain, and enhance applications on AWS services. Manage app resources and services on AWS efficiently.

Collaboration and Communication: Work collaboratively with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features. Communicate regularly with project stakeholders and provide consistent updates on project development statuses.

Code & Deployment Management: Perform routine code reviews and work closely with peers to ensure the delivery of high-quality code. Manage version control using Git and perform regular deployments.

Testing & Troubleshooting: Conduct thorough testing of applications to ensure optimal performance. Identify and troubleshoot application code-related issues and bugs.

Documentation: Produce detailed specifications and documentation.
  Document codebase and maintain development and deployment instructions.
  Qualifications & Experience:
Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
2 years of software development experience, specifically in PHP development.
Strong experience with PHP frameworks, specifically CodeIgniter.
Proficient with MySQL and experience with creating database schemas that represent and support business processes.
Experience with AWS services for app deployment is a must.
Knowledge of front-end technologies including HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript is preferred.
Familiarity with version control using Git.
Skills:
Strong problem-solving skills and ability to break down complex problem statements.
Exceptional analytical and quantitative skills with a keen attention to detail.
Strong knowledge of data structures, system design, and algorithms. Effective interpersonal, communication, and collaboration skills
Keywords: Backend, Front end, MySQL, Javascript, PHP, Data structures, System design, Information technology, CSS3

About FynTune Solutions:

Founded in 2017, FYNTUNE is the fastest growing Insure-tech start-up in the industry.
Our vision is to fundamentally change the way people engage with insurance through our SaaS and Cloud based technology solutions. Backed by a team of Insurance experts, FYNTUNEs proprietary platform provides best-in-class technology for customers need analysis, product discovery, product selection, quote generation, policy issuance, payment, policy administration, reporting, business intelligence and many more.
FYNTUNEs integrates Insurance distribution channels with Insurance companies in real time via proprietary APIs and Web Services in order to provide a unified experience to the stakeholders.
Our technology solutions are used by Financial Institutions and their millions of customers every day. Proud to state that India's leading Banks, Insurance Companies, Insurance Brokers and Mobility Players today use FYNTUNE's tech solutions for going digital and managing their customers.

Job Brief:
We are looking for a motivated PHP Developer to come join our fast-paced, fun and rewarding agile team of professionals. You will be responsible for managing back-end services and the interchange of data between the server and the users.

- At least 1+ year of working experience in Laravel, CodeIgniter, Slim Framework.
- Solid PHP basic and OOPs concepts And MY SQL
- Strong MySQL database knowledge. Knowledge of Clustering, Replication, Stored Procedures - added advantage
- Experience of Server technologies [AWS] like setup S3,EC2,load balancers, code deployment and scaling.
- Understanding of Multi-tier architecture of the application
- Proficient understanding of code version tools, such as Git, SVN.
- Knowledge of HTML, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery and ajax.
- Experience in developing and consuming web services like REST, SOAP, XML
- Proficient on API documentation tools/framework such as Postman, Swagger.
- Development experience as per SOLID principles.
- Team player, Self-motivated & Pro-active.
- Experience in Client Communication.

Job Description:
Note : Recruitment for the organization : ORYON
Website : www.oryon.in

Job Summary
We are in search of a highly skilled and experienced Senior PHP Developer with expertise in Laravel and the CodeIgniter Framework. As a Senior PHP Developer, your primary role will involve spearheading the development of robust and scalable web applications and solutions for our clients. Your profound knowledge of PHP, coupled with your mastery of the Laravel and CodeIgniter frameworks, will prove instrumental in delivering top-notch projects and fostering technical excellence within our development team.

Responsibilities
Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including Project Managers, Designers, and Front-end Developers, to comprehend project requirements and deliver innovative solutions.
Design, develop, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable PHP code utilizing the Laravel and CodeIgniter Framework.
Lead the entire software development lifecycle, from concept to deployment, ensuring that projects are completed within the specified timeline and budget.
Conduct code reviews and offer constructive feedback to junior developers, ensuring code quality and best practices are upheld.
Optimize application performance, troubleshoot issues, and implement solutions to enhance overall system efficiency.
Develop and integrate RESTful APIs and third-party APIs to facilitate seamless data exchange between applications.
Stay current with industry trends and emerging technologies, proactively suggesting new ideas and improvements to enhance the development process.
Collaborate with the QA team to conduct thorough testing, identify bugs, and guarantee the delivery of bug-free and user-friendly applications.
Mentor and guide junior developers, sharing your knowledge and expertise to nurture their professional growth.
Create technical documentation for projects, including system architecture, design patterns, and guidelines, to facilitate project understanding and future maintenance.
Continuously evaluate and adopt the latest tools, frameworks, and libraries to enhance development efficiency and remain at the forefront of the technology landscape.
Develop reusable, effective, and scalable PHP code.
Integrate payment gateways for e-commerce portals.
Manage multiple projects concurrently, effectively prioritizing tasks to meet project deadlines.

Requirements
A minimum of 3 years of professional and relevant experience as a PHP Developer, with a strong focus on Laravel and the CodeIgniter Framework.
Proven experience in developing and deploying complex web applications using PHP, RESTful Api, MySQL, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and AJAX.
Strong proficiency in API development and RESTful services.
Extensive knowledge of Laravel and the CodeIgniter Frameworks, along with proficiency in working with third-party libraries and APIs.
Experience with Postman or similar API testing tools.
Proficiency in database management and optimization (SQL and NoSQL).
A solid understanding of object-oriented programming (OOP) and design patterns.
Experience in designing and working with relational databases and crafting optimized SQL queries.
Familiarity with version control systems like Git for collaborative development.
Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to think creatively to devise effective solutions.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to collaborate effectively with teams and clients.
Proficiency in leading and directing a team.
A proven track record of leading and delivering successful web projects on time and within budget.
The ability to work independently, prioritize tasks, and manage multiple projects concurrently.
Strong attention to detail and a dedication to writing clean and maintainable code.
Familiarity with project management tools such as Jira, Trello, Asana, and others is a plus.
Experience with other PHP frameworks and Content Management Systems (CMS) is a plus.
Keywords: Laravel, Codeigniter, Rest Api Development, Database Management, PHP, Postgresql, Documentation, Api Integration, Web Application Development, Database Tuning, Backend Development, Application Development, Software Development, Postman Api, MySQL, MongoDB, Rest Api Services, Core PHP

Job Description:
Job Title: PHP Developer
Company: Smollan India Technology Pvt. Ltd.
Location: Andheri, Mumbai
Position Type: Full-Time
About Smollan India Technology Pvt. Ltd.:
Smollan India Technology Pvt. Ltd. is a dynamic and innovative technology company focused on building and executing leading retail solutions enabled by cutting-edge technology and powered by talented individuals. Our mission is to deliver growth for our clients, our team members, and the communities where we operate.
Job Description: As a PHP Developer at Smollan India Technology Pvt. Ltd., you will play a crucial role in our development team. You will primarily work with PHP and the Slim Framework to create RESTful APIs, develop features, and address bugs in our software projects. Additionally, you will have the opportunity to work on hybrid mobile app development using the Ractive framework and Cordova. Effective communication with the team will be essential to ensure seamless collaboration and project success.
Key Responsibilities:
PHP Development: Develop and maintain high-quality PHP applications using the Slim Framework to create RESTful APIs.
Feature Development: Collaborate with the development team to design and implement new features for our software projects.
Bug Fixing: Investigate and resolve software bugs and issues reported via JIRA, ensuring timely and effective solutions.
Hybrid Mobile App Development: Participate in the development of hybrid mobile applications using the Ractive framework and Cordova.
Code Optimization: Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code while following industry best practices and coding standards.
Communication: Regularly communicate with the remote and on-site team to understand project requirements, provide updates, and ensure smooth project execution.
Documentation: Maintain accurate and up-to-date documentation related to code changes, project requirements, and technical specifications.
Testing: Conduct thorough testing of developed code to ensure functionality, performance, and security.
Qualifications:
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
Proven experience as a PHP Developer, with a strong focus on API development.
Familiarity with hybrid mobile app development and the Ractive framework and Slim framework is a plus.
Proficiency in writing clean, efficient, and well-documented code.
Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Excellent communication skills to collaborate effectively with international teams.
Experience working with JIRA or similar issue tracking tools is a plus.
Ability to work independently and as part of a collaborative team.
Keywords: Slim Framework, Restful API, API, JIRA

Job Description:
A PHP Developer is responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining web applications and websites using PHP programming. This role involves collaborating with cross-functional teams to create user-friendly, dynamic, and efficient web solutions. PHP Developers play a crucial role in building and enhancing businesses online presence by coding and implementing various features and functionalities.
Key Responsibilities:
Web Development:
Develop dynamic and interactive web applications using PHP and related technologies.
Write clean, well-structured, and efficient code to create robust and scalable web solutions.
Front-End Integration:
Integrate front-end elements with server-side logic, ensuring seamless functionality and a visually appealing user experience.
Collaborate with front-end developers to implement responsive designs and user interfaces.
Database Management:
Design and maintain databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL, etc.) to support web applications.
Create efficient database queries and optimize database performance.
Application Testing:
Conduct thorough testing of web applications to identify and resolve bugs, errors, and performance issues.
Perform debugging and troubleshooting to ensure smooth functionality.
Code Optimization:
Analyze existing code and optimize it for improved performance, scalability, and security.
Stay updated with the latest PHP trends and best practices to ensure code quality.
Collaboration:
Work closely with cross-functional teams, including designers, other developers, and project managers, to deliver high-quality projects on time.
Version Control:
Utilize version control systems (e.g., Git) to manage the codebase and collaborate effectively with other developers.
Security and Compliance:
Implement security measures to protect web applications against vulnerabilities and threats.
Adhere to coding standards and best practices to ensure data privacy and compliance.
Documentation:
Create and maintain technical documentation for code, processes, and applications.
Document changes, updates, and improvements for future reference.
Qualifications and Skills:
Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
Proven experience as a PHP Developer, with a portfolio showcasing web applications and projects.
Strong proficiency in PHP programming and object-oriented programming concepts.
Familiarity with web technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and AJAX.
Experience with PHP frameworks (e.g., Laravel, Symfony) and CMS platforms (e.g., WordPress) is a plus.
Proficiency in database design and management (SQL, MySQL, PostgreSQL).
Knowledge of version control systems, especially Git.
Problem-solving skills and ability to troubleshoot technical issues.
Strong communication skills and ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.
Attention to detail and commitment to producing high-quality code.
Continuous learning mindset to keep up with evolving technologies and best practices.
Keywords: MySQL, Wordpress, Web development, Javascript, CMS, PHP, HTML, Troubleshooting, SQL, Ajax

Under the direction of the Associate Manager, this individual will work in an integrated computer network environment. An employee in this classification performs a full range of programming and analytical functions requiring a technical computer background. Responsibilities include code, test and debug computer programs, modify existing programs, write and maintain user documentation.
Principal Duties and Responsibilities (Essential Functions**):
Software Development
Analyzes the business need by identifying constraints of performance, safety and quality and studying the feasibility of the project based on business constraints (budget, time, security), existing system and technical constraints (hardware compatibility, etc.).
Designs the technical solution; makes assumptions and defines the scope of technical solution for the project's; defines technical choices from assumptions and benchmark to elaborate the solution; defines performance, security, quality commitment; makes a prototype of the solution

Ensures the development of the solution and performs regularly code reviews; supports development platform configuration and the definition of deployment procedures for code and associated data

Project Management

Ensures monitoring and analysis of application logs for the technical platform
Analyze and assess applications changes
Ensure project review; proposes improvements to the solution and measures the project's quality
Propose changes and provides support for technical evolution

Bachelors Degree in technical field or equivalent experience
5+ years of experience in full life cycle of software development using different programming languages

Solid understanding of Algorithmic, Object-Oriented Programming and Object Oriented Analysis & Design.
A good understanding of relational database design and writing optimized SQL queries, triggers and stored procedures.
Personal Skills & Competencies
Comfortable in a fast-paced environment with changing priorities
Excellent interpersonal relationship skills
Strong interest in coaching and mentoring team members
Excellent verbal and written communication skills
Strong organizational, time management and follow-up skills
Ability to identify, prioritize and execute tasks to meet project deadline

Normal and routine office duties

Job Description:
A PHP developer is responsible for writing server-side web application logic
PHP developers usually develop back-end components, connect the application with the other (often third-party) web services, and support the front-end developers by integrating their work with the application
They are also often required to develop and integrate plugins for certain popular frameworks
Writing a good job description and advertisement for a PHP developer requires attention to detail
When you are looking for an advanced PHP web developer, posting a generic web developer description in your job ad will bring numerous applications from people who may have little knowledge about good programming practices
PHP is a difficult language to tame, and puts a greater than usual burden on the developer to ensure the applications stability and performance
This article will provide you with a sample PHP developer job description that will help you write a perfect job ad, and assure that you easily find and hire the person that matches your specific criteria
Keywords: SIDE, Backend, Front end, Web services, Web technologies, Web application, Programming, PHP, Advertising

Job Description:
We are looking to hire a talented PHP developer to manage our back-end services and ensure a seamless interchange of data between the server and our users. As a PHP developer, you will be responsible for developing and coding all server-side logic. You will also be required to maintain the central database and respond to requests from front-end developers.
To ensure success as a PHP developer, you should have in-depth knowledge of object-oriented PHP programming, understanding of MVC designs, and working knowledge of front-end technologies including HTML5, JavaScript, and CSS3. Ultimately, a top-level PHP Developer can design and build efficient PHP modules while seamlessly integrating front-end technologies.

Previous experience creating scalable applications.

Job Description:
We are looking for a PHP Developer responsible for managing back - end services and the interchange of data between the server and the users. Your primary focus will be the development of all server - side logic , definition and maintenance of the central database , and ensuring high performance and responsiveness to requests from the front - end. You will also be responsible for integrating the front - end elements built by your co - workers into the application. Therefore , a basic understanding of front - end technologies is necessary as well. We are looking to hire a talented PHP developer to manage our back-end services and ensure a seamless interchange of data between the server and our users.

You will also be required to maintain the central database and respond to requests from front-end developers.
To ensure success as a PHP developer, you should have in-depth knowledge of object-oriented

Good problem-solving skills.

Job Description:
About Cybage:

Founded in 1995, Cybage Software Pvt. Ltd is a technology consulting organization specialized in outsourced product engineering services. As a leader in the Technology and product engineering space, Cybage works with some of the worlds best independent software vendors. Our solutions are focused on modern technologies and are enabled by a scientific, data driven system called Decision Mines for Digital Excellence. This unique model de-risks our approach, provides better predictability, and ensures a better value per unit cost to our clients.

An ISO 27001 certified company based in Pune, India that is partnered with more than 200 global software houses of fine repute. The array of services includes Product Engineering (OPD), Enterprise Business Solutions, Value Added Services and Idea Incubation Services. Cybage specializes in the implementation of the Offshore Development Center (ODC) model.

You will get an opportunity to be a part of highly skilled talent pool of more than 7600 employees. Apart from Pune, we have our operations hub in GNR and Hyderabad as well and we have also marked our presence in North America, Canada, UK, Europe, Japan, Australia, and Singapore. We provide seamless services and dependable deliveries to our clients from diverse industry verticals such as Media and Entertainment, Travel and Hospitality, Online Retail, Healthcare, SCM and Technology.

Knowledge of Laravel framework
Good to have - knowledge of Zend framework

Good knowledge of MySQL database.

Job Description:
We are looking to hire a talented PHP Developer to manage our back-end services and ensure a seamless interchange of data between the server and our users. As a PHP Developer, you will be responsible for developing and coding all server-side logic. You will also be required to maintain the central database and respond to requests from front-end developers.
PHP Developer Responsibilities:
Conducting analysis of website and application requirements.
Writing back-end code and building efficient PHP modules.
Developing back-end portals with an optimized database.
Troubleshooting application and code issues.
Integrating data storage solutions.
Responding to integration requests from front-end developers.
Finalizing back-end features and testing web applications.
Updating and altering application features to enhance performance.

Bachelor s degree in Computer Science or similar field.
Knowledge of PHP web frameworks including Laravel, and CodeIgniter.
Knowledge of front-end technologies including CSS3, JavaScript, and HTML5.
Understanding of object-oriented PHP programming.
Previous experience creating scalable applications.
Familiarity with SQL databases.
Ability to project manage.
Good problem-solving skills.

Please elaborate your repair and troubleshooting experience in your resume and/ or cover letter. Quality repairs and customer satisfaction are our primary mission !

Key Skills :

Honesty and Integrity the number one requirement for this job Must have iPhone and/ or iPad repair experience !! Do not apply if you do not have this background. Enjoy working on electronic gadgets We will train you on the procedures and processes. Passion for working with electronic gadgets ! Positive personality ! Reliable and timely strong work ethic Strong focus on quality repairs. The ability to read, write and communicate in English in order to read and comprehend assembly manuals and process documentation. Oral and written communication proficiency. Dismantle old electronic devices for OEM parts. Interact with customers as needed, providing exceptional customer service. Keeps work area clean and sterile. Preference will be given to applicants who Have a bright personality. Who are kind to customers. Who have an excellent presentation and take care of their personal hygiene (Look fresh at all times !). Who can work under high stress. Who are willing to learn. Who have excellent communication skills. Kindly Note : Selected candidates will be contacted for an interview. Please no applicants from abroad, only those who are legally able to work in India.

Job Description:
JOB SUMMARY

We are searching for outstanding web developers to be responsible for developing innovative, reusable web- based tools for progressive activism and community building. A Successful Candidate will have demonstrable experience building real applications in Good work environment and will be able to make a meaningful contribution from day one. You will be comfortable working with team members at all levels and departments within the organization. This is a Perfect Opportunity for young Developers looking to play a key role in creating enabling technology for a leading Web and Mobile based Company in Chennai.

RESPONSIBILITIES

Knowledge of software development life cycle.
Work closely with Project Managers and other members of the Development Team to both develop detailed specification documents with clear Project deliverable and timelines and to ensure timely completion.
Determine appropriate architecture, technical solutions and make relevant recommendations to clients.
Communicate to the Project Manager and Team Leaders with efficiency and accuracy in any progress and / or delays.
Engage in outside- the- box thinking to provide high value- of- service to clients.
Alert colleagues to emerging technologies or applications and the opportunities to integrate them into operations and activities.
Be actively involved in and contribute regularly to the development community of the CMS (Magento / Joomla / Drupal / Wordpress / Zend Framework / Cake PHP) .
Strong debugging skills and ability to easily and quickly read and modify existing Code.
Strong communication skills.
Knowledge of other e- commerce is added advantage (prestashop, Shopify, OS commerce, OpenCart, etc...)

Job Description:
A PHP Developer is responsible for managing back-end services and the interchange of data between the server and the users. Your primary focus will be the development of all server-side logic, definition and maintenance of the central database, and ensuring high performance and responsiveness to requests from the front-end. You will also be responsible for integrating the front-end elements built by your co-workers into the application. Therefore, a basic understanding of front-end technologies is necessary as well. The candidates should have experience of developing websites with PHP and style sheets and scripting.
We are looking to hire a talented PHP developer to manage our back-end services and ensure a seamless interchange of data between the server and our users. As a PHP developer, you will be responsible for developing and coding all server-side logic. You will also be required to maintain the central database and respond to requests from front-end developers.
To ensure success as a PHP developer, you should have in-depth knowledge of object-oriented PHP programming, understanding of MVC designs, and working knowledge of front-end technologies including HTML5, JavaScript, and CSS3. Ultimately, a top-level PHP Developer can design and build efficient PHP modules while seamlessly integrating front-end technologies.
Responsibilities :
Write various ad-hoc scripts to facilitate data transfer between our systems.
Must be proficient in PHP, MySQL, CSS, HTML, Javascript, AJAX, XML.
Should have experience with Joomla, WordPress, Drupal, Magento.
Analyze an existing mysql database and write custom scripts to create ad-hoc reports.
Write larger-scale scripts based on the changing needs of our business.
Write clean , well designed code, Produce detailed specifications.
Troubleshoot, test and maintain the core product software.
Understanding client requirements and functional specifications.
Integration of user-facing elements developed by front-end developers
Build efficient, testable, and reusable PHP modules
Solve complex performance problems and architectural challenges
Integration of data storage solutions {may include databases, key-value stores, blob stores, etc.}
Conducting analysis of website and application requirements.
Writing back-end code and building efficient PHP modules.
Developing back-end portals with an optimized database.
Troubleshooting application and code issues.
Integrating data storage solutions.
Responding to integration requests from front-end developers.
Finalizing back-end features and testing web applications.
Updating and altering application features to enhance performance.
Requirements :
Strong knowledge of PHP web frameworks {such as Laravel, Yii, etc depending on your technology stack}
Understanding the fully synchronous behavior of PHP
Understanding of MVC design patterns
Basic understanding of front-end technologies, such as JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3
Knowledge of object oriented PHP programming
Understanding accessibility and security compliance {{Depending on the specific project}}
Strong knowledge of the common PHP or web server exploits and their solutions
Understanding fundamental design principles behind a scalable application
User authentication and authorization between multiple systems, servers, and environments
Integration of multiple data sources and databases into one system
Familiarity with limitations of PHP as a platform and its workarounds
Creating database schemas that represent and support business processes
Familiarity with SQL/NoSQL databases and their declarative query languages
Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git
Keywords: Drupal, jQuery, XML, MySQL, Wordpress, Javascript, PHP, Joomla, SQL, Ajax

Job Description:
We are looking for an experienced Back-end Developer that is alr actively involved with WordPress plugin development. Youll help design new features, write/rewrite code, and tackle complex challenges at scale. You will also regularly conduct code reviews and mentor your peers.
Additionally, this is a leadership position where you will earn the opportunity to lead release cycles and manage a small team of developers. You need to be passionate about - and have first-hand experience with - some degree of project management.
Interested in applying
Please read/follow the next steps outlined in "How to Apply" at the bottom of this listing.
Attention to detail is one of our core values! This is your chance to stand out
To love this role, here is the type of person you are:
You are a self-starter who loves taking initiative and seeing things through from conception to completion. Our developers "own" features/tasks and are responsible for scoping, development, and testing.
Youre an excellent communicator, fluent in both verbal and written English, who makes sure nothing slips through the cracks. We believe communication is critical and there is no such thing as over-communicating.
You take pride in the quality and craftsmanship of your work rather than just doing it to get it done - with attention to detail.
You love mentoring your peers and helping them "level up" just as much as writing code.
You are comfortable giving critical feedback to peers (in a respectful and productive manner) and also dont take feedback given personally.
Youre happy jumping between front-end and back-end development tasks or tackling tasks that require both.
Youre happy working on tasks of all sizes - from small bug fixes and enhancements to large features/rewrites.
Keywords: Backend, Front end, Project management, Wordpress, PHP, Mentor, Management, Testing

Job Description:
Company Profile:

iTEDIUM
iTEDIUM is a SaaS company growing in new directions. We are a technology company that takes pride in simplifying some of the most complex processes for large and small organizations. We work in the area of benefit administration, and with the constant changes offered to employees across the country, we find joy in taking what can be a tedious task and making it easy, affordable, and flexible.

Culture:
We believe that giving developers the best tools available and the means to affect their own environment will result in best of breed software. Our solution is fully AWS hosted, including our work stations. We run a out the box Scrum setup - planning, daily stand ups, reviews, and retrospectives on a two week iteration. We occasionally self-correct, but we always work to have the right balance informed by our retrospectives.We have offices in both Kansas City and Tampa, however our developers are 100% remote.

The Position

iTEDIUM is looking for a Full Stack Developer to join its India team. The candidate is expected to be a Member of the Development team with hands-on experience as well as having proven ability in designing, building and supporting enterprise-scale solutions. The candidate must be result-oriented, self-motivated and have the ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment. This role requires frequent interactions with project and product managers, other developers in team, QA and other stakeholders, in order to ensure timely delivery.

1. Provide ongoing maintenance, support and enhancements for SaaS platform-based applications

2. Serve as key member of the engineering team

3. Follow established standards compliant with approved/agreed upon design and coding patterns

4. The candidate should understand the expectation of supporting a US based firm. It is expected that hours of availability will overlap (primarily US mornings).

5. It is also expected that the candidate is able to have reliable connectivity for video conferencing and instant messaging.

Qualifications/Skills

Open Source platform: LAMP Stack, JavaScript, JQuery, HTML5, CSS3, Apache, Unix, Linux, PHP

CMS and frameworks: Wordpress, Opencart, Code Igniter, Laravel, Zend

Databases: MySQL

Restful APIs use and development

Other tools: Jira, Source repository tools like GIT, SVN

Require experience with Jira

Required experience with Agile, Kanban and/or Scrum style development

He/She has written proprietary code for custom web-based applications

Familiar with code reviews

Strong grasp on release management best practices

Education-

The candidate should have a Bachelors degree in Computer Science /Computer Applications, Engineering or a related field and/or relevant work experience in the IT field between 3- 5

Please revert with the following details:

* Total IT Experience -

* Relevant Experience -

* Current Company -

* Current CTC -

* Notice Period -

* Highest Qualification -

* Current Location -


Send us your CV at : smita@itedium.com
Keywords: PHP, codeigniter, mysql, JQuery, Laravel, Core PHP

Job Description:
Job Description of PHP Developer:

We are looking to hire a talented PHP developer to manage our back-end services and ensure a seamless interchange of data between the server and our users. As a PHP developer, you will be responsible for developing and coding all server-side logic. You will also be required to maintain the central database and respond to requests from front-end developers.

To ensure success as a PHP developer, you should have in-depth knowledge of object-oriented PHP programming, understanding of MVC designs, and working knowledge of front-end technologies including HTML5, JavaScript, jQuery, and CSS3. Ultimately, a top-level PHP Developer can design and build efficient PHP modules while seamlessly integrating front-end technologies.

PHP Developer Responsibilities:
Conducting analysis of website and application requirements.
Writing back-end code and building efficient PHP modules.
Developing back-end portals with an optimized database.
Proficient usage of OOPS concept.
Troubleshooting application and code issues.
Integrating data storage solutions.
Responding to integration requests from front-end developers.
Finalizing back-end features and testing web applications.
Updating and altering application features to enhance performance.

PHP Developer Requirements:
Knowledge of PHP web frameworks including Laravel, and CodeIgniter.
Knowledge of PHP CMS frameworks like WordPress.
Knowledge of front-end technologies including CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, and HTML5.
Understanding of object-oriented PHP programming.
Previous experience creating scalable applications.
Proficient with code versioning tools including Git, Mercurial, CVS, and SVN.
Familiarity with SQL/NoSQL databases.
Ability to project manage.
Good problem-solving skills.
Keywords: PHP, Php Laravel, Wordpress, Javascript, Bootstrap, JQuery, Codeigniter, Html/Css

Job Description:
A PHP developer is responsible for writing server-side web application logic
PHP developers usually develop back-end components, connect the application with the other (often third-party) web services, and support the front-end developers by integrating their work with the application
They are also often required to develop and integrate plugins for certain popular frameworks
Writing a good job description and advertisement for a PHP developer requires attention to detail
When you are looking for an advanced PHP web developer, posting a generic web developer description in your job ad will bring numerous applications from people who may have little knowledge about good programming practices
PHP is a difficult language to tame, and puts a greater than usual burden on the developer to ensure the applications stability and performance
This article will provide you with a sample PHP developer job description that will help you write a perfect job ad, and assure that you easily find and hire the person that matches your specific criteria
Keywords: SIDE, Backend, Front end, Web technologies, Web services, Web application, Programming, PHP, Advertising

Job Description:
ISMG is looking for a highly skilled full-stack web developer with an experienced background in front and back-end development and coding languages, development frameworks, and third-party libraries
The Full-Stack PHP Developer will be a part of a cross-functional team and responsible for the full development life cycle, from conception to deployment, ensuring the responsiveness of applications, and working alongside graphic designers for web design features, among other duties
The Full-Stack PHP Developer will be required to see out a project from conception to final product, requiring good organizational skills and attention to detail
Responsibilities
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and develop innovative solutions that meet business needs.
Deliver our latest in-house built Marketing Platform.
Coordinate with business stakeholders to provide end-to-end solutions.
Work as a key team member alongside other application developers.
Participate in full-stack code and architecture reviews.
Optimize system performance and troubleshoot issues as they arise.
Stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and industry trends to drive continuous improvement.
Maintain existing applications.
Collaborate with other team members (developers, designers, product managers, etc.).
Implement test-driven development practices (PHPUnit, Selenium).
Ensure code quality through thorough testing and debugging processes.
Requirements
A Bachelor s Degree or higher.
6+ years of experience in a similar position.
Good knowledge and understanding of object-oriented programming and SOLID principles.
6+ years of experience and an excellent understanding of PHP Backend Programming Language.
At least 3+ years of experience with Laravel PHP MVC framework.
Strong understanding of HTML/CSS and Front-end frameworks (Tailwind, Bootstrap , Foundation etc.) and CSS preprocessor s scripting languages (LESS, SASS, SCSS etc.).
6+ years of experience and an excellent understanding of JavaScript.
Strong knowledge of the following JavaScript libraries and frameworks:
j Query
Lodash
Node JS (JavaScript Runtime Engine)
Vue JS 3
Nuxt 3
Excellent understanding of relational databases and SQL (MySQL).
Experience ntegrating with 3rd parties via APIs .
Experience managing source control using Git .
Outstanding English verbal and written communication skills.
Ideally, experience with digital marketing platforms and integrations (analytics trackers, content & email marketing, big data analysis).
Experience with NoSQL Databases (Mongo DB), caching solutions: redis, Memcache .
Experience with message brokers: RabbitMQ , search engines: sphinx , SOLR .
Experience with automation tools: ansible, Jenkins, vagrant/docker.
Strong problem-solving skills and ability to analyze and resolve complex technical issues.
Excellent teamwork and communication skills to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.
Ability to work independently and manage multiple tasks and projects simultaneously.
Keywords: Data analysis, Coding, MySQL, Javascript, PHP, HTML, Web designing, Digital marketing, Analytics, SQL

Job Description:
Idox is recruiting an Account Manager to be responsible for its Local Government client relationships in England, especially southern regions
We are looking to hire someone with experience of the UK public sector to oversee and develop our long-term customer engagement
The Account Manager s role is to oversee a portfolio of assigned customers, develop business within existing clients and actively seek new sales opportunities
The principal solutions involve our Uniform and Idox Cloud case management systems, private Cloud hosting, document management, as well as related professional and managed services
Our Idox Account Management model encompasses a wide range of activities, the key ones being development of strong customer relationships, connecting with key stakeholders, and delivering successful business growth within the territory to attain and exceed quotas and targets, as well as strategic and tactical goals for Idox
You will liaise with other internal teams (including Customer Services, Delivery and Product Development departments) to support you and your customers
The role will be largely home-based but will require some travel to meet with clients and colleagues
A successful Idox Account Manager is pivotal for our sales team
Above all, you will be responsible for ensuring that Idox is meeting our clients needs and that our individual customers are positively engaged with our products and services
In addition to this, you will be identifying and progressing new opportunities, forward planning, customer awareness campaigns and the provision of timely and reliable management information to support Idox objectives
This means representing the whole range of our solutions to your customers and you will bring insights and intelligence back to the Group
Idox will provide the mentoring and development you need to succeed as a member of our team, so that you can apply your existing expertise to support our customers
Keywords: Managed services, Sales, Management systems, PHP, Account management, private cloud, Document management, Management, Customer engagement, Recruitment

Job Description:
JOB PURPOSE / SUMMARY A well-funded E-learning company is looking for Developer who shall be responsible for the creation and implementation of a wide variety of Web-based products using PHP, JavaScript, MySQL and AJAX. Participating in a team-oriented environment to develop complex web-based applications. Maintaining existing codebase, to include troubleshooting bugs and adding new features. Converting data from various formats (Excel, ACCESS etc.) into developed databases. We are looking for developers who have experience of interactive functionality on high traffic portals.

DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES  Understand the requirements & functional specifications  Developing and maintaining dynamic websites and web applications  Ensuring foolproof performance of the deliverable  Coordinating with co-developers and other related departments  Sending regular updates about project status SKILLS  Experience building large scale/ high traffic websites.  Must be proficient in PHP, MySQL, CSS, HTML, JavaScript, AJAX, XML.  Working knowledge in Core PHP.  Experience with Joomla, WordPress, Drupal, Magento.  Good written communication skills (English).  Capacity to work independently and also as a part of team.  Dedication and commitment towards work.  Positive attitude.  Expert in scripting languages and database engines like: SQL Server (T-SQL &/ or Admin), mySQL, Oracle, Postgres PHP, JSP, Java, VBScript, ASP/ .NET, ADO, ADO.Net Apache, IIS, other XML and XSL POLICY & SERVICE RESPONSIBILITY NA ADMINISTRATIVE/ MANAGERIAL RESPONSIBILITIES The post holder has any responsibility for management, supervision of the task allocated within the team or by Project supervisor. Position Holder is responsible for assessments after training and development provided by the company. Once the Project starts to grow the Position Holder may be required to be responsible for recruitment, appraising and disciplinary matters of new recruits on the project vertical. It is a fast growing position and company would expect the position holder to reach middle level management position within 12 months. Itrsquos a semi incubation centre so invest made in training the position holder for Key management skills and Business development skills must be demonstrated in the work and the position holder must have the drive to grow quickly both in terms of responsibilities and hierarchal position in the organisation. INFORMATION RESOURCES Position holder will be trained regards to inputting data, maintaining information systems/ databases and report writing. MENTAL EFFORT Good concentration required, unpredictability and interruptions shall not be expected as reasons for not meeting deadlines. The position holder must have capabilities to remain focused and develop crisis management skills. THE WORKPLACE: The post-holder is likely to be based at the Sales , Training and Project Development Unit in Delhi ( Near Karkarduma Metro Station ) and other bases they will be required to travel to.includes Noida and South Delhi but the travel is not frequent. There may be international and national travel depending on the allocated project but all travel and expenses are paid by the company.

EQUAL OPPORTUNITIES The Organisation is committed to eliminate racism, sexism and forms of discrimination. The Trust will not discriminate on grounds of age, colour, disability, ethnic origin, gender, gender reassignment, culture, health status, marital status, social or economic status, nationality or national origins, race, religious beliefs, or non beliefs, responsibility for dependants, sexuality, trade union membership or hours of work. It is required of all employees to uphold this policy in the course of their employment with the Organisation and whilst undertaking their duties.

HEALTH & SAFETY AT WORK Position holder must get self insured to cover any kind of risks. CONFIDENTIALITY The post holder will maintain confidentiality when dealing with sensitive material and information, but will encourage people to be open and raise concerns

. DATA PROTECTION All staff must be aware of the Data Protection Act. The protection of data about individuals is a requirement of the law and if any employee is found to have permitted unauthorised disclosure, the organisation and the individual may be prosecuted. Disciplinary action will be taken for any breach.

MOBILITY/ FLEXIBILITY Your normal place of work will be as stated above, but as a term of your employment you may be required to work from any of the organisations establishments within the geographical area of NCR.

Job Description:
As a Senior PHP Developer, you will play a pivotal role in the design, development, and maintenance of web applications and systems built using PHP
You will be responsible for leading and mentoring a team of developers, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and ensuring the scalability, performance, and security of PHP-based solutions
This role requires a deep understanding of PHP, modern web development practices, and a commitment to delivering high-quality, maintainable cod
Key Responsibilities:
Software Development:
Develop, test, and maintain web applications using PHP and related technologies.
Write clean, efficient, and secure code to meet project requirements.
Collaborate with front-end developers to integrate user-facing elements with server-side logic.
Integrate third-party APIs and libraries when necessary.
Technical Leadership:
Lead and mentor a team of PHP developers, providing guidance and code reviews.
Participate in architectural discussions and decisions for projects.
Help define coding standards and best practices for the development team.
System Optimization:
Optimize the performance and scalability of PHP applications.
Identify and resolve bottlenecks, bugs, and other performance issues.
Ensure the application's security and data protection measures are in place.
Database Management:
Design and maintain database schemas, ensuring data integrity.
Write efficient SQL queries and work with database systems (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL).
Documentation and Testing:
Create and maintain technical documentation, including code documentation and system architecture.
Conduct thorough unit testing and participate in system testing and quality assurance processes.
Collaboration:
Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including front-end developers, designers, and product managers.
Communicate effectively with team members and stakeholders to gather project requirements and provide project updates.
Continuous Learning:
Stay up-to-date with the latest PHP trends, tools, and best practices.
Suggest and implement improvements to existing processes and technologies.
Problem Solving:
Analyze and troubleshoot complex technical issues and provide effective solutions.
Proactively identify potential problems and take corrective actions.
Qualifications:
Proven experience as a PHP developer, with a strong portfolio of web applications.
Proficiency in PHP, including modern PHP frameworks (e.g., codeigniter).
Strong knowledge of web technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) and front-end frameworks (e.g., React, Vue.js) is a plus.
Experience with database design and management using MySQL or similar.
Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git) and collaborative development workflows.
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Strong communication and teamwork skills.
Previous leadership or mentoring experience is preferred for a senior role.

1 to 3 Years
The Internet of Things is making its way into our everyday life, whether we notice it or not. Smart City deployments and solutions make up one of the largest IoT markets in the world. These applications are developed to increase citizen safety, save government money, reduce environment footprint and more. Here is a list of some of the top Smart City solutions.

Smart Parking Smart Parking is perhaps the most adopted IoT smart city solution of all. Major cities around the world are incorporating sensors and devices that count the number of cars in a lot, notify for open spaces and even notify users when their parking time has expired. There are many smart parking benefits that will help transform a city into a smart city.

Waste Management The amount of trash is globally increasing at a very high rate. Cities will be forced to become smarter by integrating automation solutions that manage this increase in waste. This is being done by efforts such as smart trash sorting, truck optimization and even underground pipes collecting household garbage.

Smart Street Lighting Every city of lights has an extensive process to managing light posts, traffic lights and any city- owned device with a bulb. By capturing and automating smart city data correctly, this maintenance need could be reduced to a streamlined process from monitoring and notifying to instillation and restocking.

Water Management Cities must manage their drinking water to ensure that citizens have enough to safely consume. Smart city water management can include optimized contamination monitoring, leak detection, quality control, maintenance and more.

Smart Surveillance Safety is key in major cities that experience crime in numbers. IoT physical security can include intelligent monitoring, tampering alerts, perimeter protection, facial recognition and automobile tracking.

Smart Buildings The Internet of Things is also changing building management throughout cities by introducing smart building devices and solutions. Office building managers can save money and provide better service to tenants by incorporating systems like remote monitoring, smart landscaping, IoT physical security and appliance maintenance.

As a PHP developer, you will be responsible for developing and coding all server-side logic. You will also be required to maintain the central database and respond to requests from front-end developers.
To ensure success as a PHP developer, you should have in-depth knowledge of object-oriented PHP programming, an understanding of MVC designs, and working knowledge of front-end technologies including HTML5, JavaScript, and CSS3. Ultimately, a top-level PHP Developer can design and build efficient PHP modules while seamlessly integrating front-end technologies.

Database designing and maintenance.
Build reusable code and libraries for future use.
Solve complex performance problems and architectural challenges.
Knowledge in API integration

Job Title: PHP Developer for a Singapore based company
Job Description:
PHP Developer for a Singapore based company my itForte - Job Detail PHP Developer for a Singapore based company Required Skills: Our client, a Singapore based Technology Company, provides Information and Communication Technology (ICT) solutions for agriculture industries. They partner with world-class Information and Communication Technology service and infrastructure providers to deliver innovative systems meeting the needs of the agriculture industry. Their flagship product, Agriculture Management Information System [AMIS], enables transparency, traceability and compliance of agricultural produce with international regulations. The company is recognized as a leader in its field by some of the largest international manufacturers of products which use crop products as raw material inputs.
They plan to open a development cum support center In Noida for implementations and product support, which will initially house around 10-12 people.
About the role:
PHP developers will be responsible for maintenance, patching, updating, and bug fixing of the PHP codebase of our projects, as well as implementation of some new features such as report views. Ideal candidates will have a post-secondary degree in Information Systems, Software Engineering, or related discipline, with two or more years experience developing database-driven web applications.
The technologies mastered must include: MVC frameworks (esp. CakePHP and CodeIgniter) - Additional experience in Linux and project management is desired. The PHP developer will report to the Team Leader, who in turn will report to the Project Manager.
Location: Noida, Delhi NC
Keywords: Telecom, Linux, Project management, MySQL, Javascript, PHP, HTML, CakePHP, MVC, Ajax

Job Description:
Freedom: Choose how you want to build.
Ownership: Guide the product and its features to success.
Growth: Leverage our network of mentors from top companies like Meta, CleverTap, Freshworks, etc.

About the role
As our Senior Backend Engineer, youll take the wheel in writing scalable APIs as well as the design, strategy, and quality of software development
Youll build and maintain a clean code base, collaborating with the frontend team in creating great experiences for our customers
The cherry on top: your efforts will contribute to helping fitness businesses across the world in managing and growing their business
What you'll do
Own design, strategy, and quality of software development for your team

Design & develop highly scalable, reliable, secure, and fault-tolerant systems and code base with minimal guidance
Collaborate with other engineering teams to learn and share best practices
Research new technologies and tools to improve your own products and processes
Exercise high ownership and initiative
What you'll need
At least 1 year of experience working in a funded startup (preferred)
At least 2 years of relevant software development experience; hands-on experience in designing and implementing low latency RESTful services, with knowledge of PHP and related frameworks
Proficiency in OOP, SQL, Design Patterns, and software best practices
Experience in working on a SaaS product (preferred)

Job Description:
Job Description

Primary Responsibilities:


Development of web applications and scripts (which includes APIs, web reports, etc) using PHP programming language and MySQL & SQL Server databases.

Qualifications, Skills & Requirements:


Bachelor\'s degree in Computer Science or Information Technology.

At least 4 years of hands-on experience with PHP, Cakephp, MySQL, Smarty, Joomla, WordPress, OsCommerce, HTML, DHTML, JQuery, JavaScript, CSS.

Experience with SVN, MS SQL, Access, Visual Basic, C# and Windows server is a plus.

Knowledge of Yahoo store or X-Cart, osCommerce, Smarty would be of an advantage.

Positive attitude and strong work ethics, ability to multi task is a must.

Ability to program to specification.

Willingness to learn

Willing to work in USA time frame (9:00 pm to 6:00 am)

Effective time management skills

Excellent verbal and written communication skills

A sharp mind with the ability to grasp concepts quickly and work out complex logic problems

A demonstrated ability to learn by doing and taking initiative to "figure things out"


Soft skills & work Ethics requirement: (Please rate your candidate for each of these skills to your best:


Must have excellent or good English writing and speaking skills

Must be a team player

Must be punctual to office

Should meet project and task deadlines.

Should provide professional. (2 Professional References)


Pre-Interview Steps :



We need to know your tenure at each job location and total experience

We need one reference each from each job or at least 3 reference (one person who has worked with you and two who have supervised you)

Please make sure that candidate shows in interview with 2 hard copy of resume

They have to fill and bring the personal information document. It has lots of relevant question which shortens the interview process
